title: new update broke emotes
body: i cant equip the new emote for having played a certain amount of time i assume its that emote specifically but im not sure i didnt buy the other ones riot check this out please

replies.body: Try refreshing your client really quick for me and try then. Some people haven't been able to equip it due to the client not *fully* realizing it was there. Let me know if that doesn't help though!
got back on tonight working fine
